commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
Windster
<%= if @current_user do %>
  • <%= @current_user.email %>
  • <%= link "Settings", to: Routes.user_settings_path(@conn, :edit) %>
  • <%= link "Log out", to: Routes.user_session_path(@conn, :delete), method: :delete %>
    • <% end %>
